heading: Professional Land Surveying
subheading: Accurate land, utility, and geospatial data supporting design, construction, and development.

categories.name: Surveying
categories.description: Accurate land and construction surveys supporting design, development, and legal requirements across all project phases.

services.name: Horizontal & Vertical Control Surveys
services.description: Establish precise control networks to support boundary determination, construction layout, and geospatial accuracy.
services.subText: Baseline control for reliable survey data

services.name: GPS & RTK Surveys
services.description: High-accuracy positioning using GPS and Real-Time Kinematic methods for efficient and repeatable results.
services.subText: Ideal for large sites and rapid data collection

services.name: Topographic Surveys
services.description: Detailed mapping of existing terrain, features, and improvements to support engineering and site design.

services.name: As-Built Surveys
services.description: Document completed construction to verify compliance with plans, specifications, and regulatory requirements.

services.name: Boundary, Jurisdictional & Sectional Line Surveys
services.description: Determine property boundaries, jurisdictional limits, and sectional lines in accordance with legal standards.
services.subText: Critical for ownership and legal clarity

services.name: Construction & Right-of-Way Surveys
services.description: Provide layout, staking, and verification services throughout all stages of construction and roadway projects.

categories.name: Utility Coordination
categories.description: Identify and map existing underground utilities to reduce risk, improve safety, and support informed design decisions.

services.name: Subsurface Utility Engineering (SUE)
services.description: Utility designation and location services performed in accordance with ASCE 38 standards.

services.name: Ground Penetrating Radar (GPR)
services.description: Non-invasive subsurface scanning to detect utilities, structures, and anomalies below the surface.
services.subText: Effective where records are incomplete or unavailable

services.name: Electromagnetic Utility Detection
services.description: Locate conductive utilities using electromagnetic signals for accurate horizontal positioning.

services.name: Vacuum Excavation
services.description: Expose underground utilities safely to confirm depth and position without damaging existing infrastructure.

categories.name: 3D Rendering & Advanced Data Collection
categories.description: High-resolution spatial data capture and modeling for complex environments and specialized applications.

services.name: Digital Terrain Modeling (DTM)
services.description: Create accurate digital representations of terrain for analysis, design, and visualization.

services.name: Hydrographic & Bathymetric Surveys
services.description: Survey submerged terrain and water bodies to determine depths, contours, and underwater features.

services.name: Digital Scanning Surveys
services.description: High-density 3D scanning of bridges, roadways, and structures for detailed measurement and documentation.

services.name: Aerial Photogrammetry Control
services.description: Establish horizontal and vertical control to support aerial mapping and photogrammetric surveys.
services.subText: Ensures accuracy in aerial data products
